about_the_game:
Welcome to Monsterfall

In Monsterfall, you'll compete against other monsters to claim the title of ultimate champion. Choose from six unique characters, each with their own strengths, weaknesses, and abilities. Master their skills and outmaneuver your opponents to reign supreme.

Gameplay Overview

In this fast-paced multiplayer game, 2-4 players will clash in a battle of wits and reflexes. Each match is a best-of-rounds competition, with the winner being the first to claim a set number of rounds. The game features a unique "Sudden Death" mechanic, which adds an extra layer of excitement and challenge to each match.

Key Features

  • 6 playable monsters, each with their own distinct characteristics and abilities

  • 2 abilities per monster, offering a range of strategic options and playstyles

  • "Sudden Death" mechanic, which introduces an element of unpredictability and tension to each match

  • Round stats and leaderboard tracking, allowing you to monitor your progress and compete with friends

  • Local multiplayer support for 2-4 players, using joysticks as the primary control method

Compete, Adapt, and Dominate

Will you emerge victorious as the ultimate Monsterfall champion? With its unique blend of strategy and competition, Monsterfall is the perfect game for players looking for a fun and challenging multiplayer experience. Gather your friends, grab your joysticks, and get ready to fall into the world of Monsterfall!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 hardware CPU threads - Intel® Core™ i5 750 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 1 GB or more and should be a DirectX 11-compatible with support for Shader Model 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
